configuration.name: Scenario: The user can perform a search using the 'THROW PILLOWS' option from the dropdown without registering, access the products and their details on the results page, and see the total number of results displayed.

option.name: NAME_FILTER
option.value: ^The user can perform a search using the \'THROW PILLOWS\' option from the dropdown without registering\, access the products and their details on the results page\, and see the total number of results displayed\.$

option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: --plugin org.jetbrains.plugins.cucumber.java.run.CucumberJvm5SMFormatter --name "^The user can perform a search using the \'THROW PILLOWS\' option from the dropdown without registering\, access the products and their details on the results page\, and see the total number of results displayed\.$"

option.name: SUGGESTED_NAME
option.value: Scenario: The user can perform a search using the 'THROW PILLOWS' option from the dropdown without registering, access the products and their details on the results page, and see the total number of results displayed.

configuration.name: Scenario: The user can search using the 'VINTAGE' option from the dropdown without registering, access the products and product details on the resulting page, and see the total number of results.

option.name: NAME_FILTER
option.value: ^The user can search using the \'VINTAGE\' option from the dropdown without registering\, access the products and product details on the resulting page\, and see the total number of results\.$

option.value: --plugin org.jetbrains.plugins.cucumber.java.run.CucumberJvm5SMFormatter --name "^The user can search using the \'VINTAGE\' option from the dropdown without registering\, access the products and product details on the resulting page\, and see the total number of results\.$"

option.name: SUGGESTED_NAME
option.value: Scenario: The user can search using the 'VINTAGE' option from the dropdown without registering, access the products and product details on the resulting page, and see the total number of results.

configuration.name: Scenario: The user searches for a specific type of product and views the relevant results.

option.name: SUGGESTED_NAME
